column4: I do want to figure out how to get past the falsely-broken dependency on this
I just need to find the textfile that stores the wrong info for the dvdrip package
and I'm willing to try a force-install
where are the info files on packages stored?
what I'm seeing is that it wants transcode "2:0.6.6" but transcode version I have is 0.6.12
so someone screwed up an apt file
I spend all week dealing with rpm based installs then I get home and play with Ubuntu
